backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and order records with access control, providing CRUD operations for profiles and orders.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UX behaviors to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A prewritten set of summaries describing major frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark mode colors and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React app and mounting the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app container managing authentication, navigation, and view rendering for dashboard, wizard, and orders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing only the current year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding and authentication controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Card prompting unauthenticated users to log in with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Empty placeholder for a future profile setup component.
frontend/src/components/StepIndicator.ts: Visual step indicator component showing progress across multiple steps.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Displays order statistics, material breakdown, and a preview of recent orders with loading and error handling. Uses callbacks to create or view orders and edit recent ones.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/useOrder: Fetches aggregated order statistics from the backend via react-query and the actor identity. Enabled only when the actor is available.
Shows a list of recent orders with loading and error states and allows creating or editing orders. Displays a success banner after saving or updating an order.
Defines materials, order types, statuses, initial form data, and logic for enabling weight fields based on the selected order type. Provides type-safe structures for order form handling.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderWizard: Multi-step form for creating or editing orders, handling field state, validation, mode switching, and submitting via place or update mutations. Loads existing order data when editing.
frontend/src/features/orders/useGetOrder: Retrieves a single order by bill number with detailed error handling for authorization and missing records. Query runs only when an actor is available and a bill number is provided.
frontend/src/features/orders/usePlaceOrd: Mutation hook to create a new order, sanitizing numeric inputs and invoking the backend actor. Invalidates recent orders and stats on success.
frontend/src/features/orders/useRecentOr: Fetches a limited list of recent orders using the backend actor and react-query. Automatically updates when actor changes.
frontend/src/features/orders/useUpdateOr: Mutation hook to update an existing order with numeric sanitization and error handling. Refreshes recent orders and stats after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries. Handles access control initialization via a secret token.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook to fetch the caller's user role using an actor, though currently unused.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light and dark theme color variables for the jewellery theme.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Contains helpers for formatting dates from nanoseconds and converting stored weight values to display format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, versions, and feature requests for the Jewellery Orders project.
